Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to precluding the department of homeless services from requiring a child’s presence at an intake center when a family with children applies for shelter
Items.MatterName: Precluding the department of homeless services from requiring a child’s presence at an intake center when a family with children applies for shelter.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of homeless services to provide process navigator services to every family with children entering an intake center
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of homeless services to provide process navigator services to every family with children entering an intake center.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to requiring the department of homeless services to report on the feasibility of establishing partnerships with community-based organizations to accept and process applications for shelter intake from families with children
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of homeless services to report on the feasibility of partnering with community-based nonprofit organizations to accept and process applications for shelter intake from families with children.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of homeless services to designate eligibility specialists at shelters
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of homeless services to designate eligibility specialists at shelters.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the establishment of intake centers for families with children
Items.MatterName: Establishment of intake centers for families with children.

Items.Title: Oversight - Families with Children in DHS Shelters.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Families with Children in DHS Shelters.
